const response = await client.search({
  index: "my-index-*",
  query: {
    bool: {
      must: [
        {
          match: {
            "user.id": "kimchy",
          },
        },
      ],
      must_not: [
        {
          terms: {
            _index: ["my-index-01"],
          },
        },
      ],
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
